content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 15 Nov 2018My wife is a Taiwanese,on Long-term visit pass, with a Master in Social Science from Taiwan. What are the available career options in Singapore, which will require her expertise?She used to be a teacher back in Taiwan. On a side-note, her English is not very good. She is willing to try to continue upgrading herself through several course.1 answerAnswerBump0
